Class Square

java.lang.Object
Square
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
Square represents each image on the board There are a total of 25 squares on the game board
Since:
1.0

    • Square

      public Square​(int imageType, int xCoordinate, int yCoordinate, Board board)
      Parameters:
      imageType - The type of image i.e Frog, Lilypad, Water
      xCoordinate - The X coordinate of the where the square shoudld be stored
      yCoordinate - The Y coordinate of the where the square shoudld be stored
      board - The board of where to store the squares
